data.text: @andiant11 @JakeSkywalkerJr @johncampea Congratulations. But it hasn’t been confirmed, just strongly hinted at... https://t.co/WaxfK5R67C

@JakeSkywalkerJr @johncampea *fast forward to the first 10 minutes of ep 9 where Finn is brutally slain by KYLE (kylo) Ren and Poe starts a relationship with that one guy who said “it’s a bigger Death Star” in TFA*

@GiggleZenMaster @johncampea Kyle? LOL ... Anyone expecting a romantic arc in Ep 9 between Kyle (haha) and Rey are delusional.  I predict no romantic arc for Rey and if the slim chance she does it will be 90% Finn  or 10% Poe.  At least they don't try to kill Rey and her friends.

@GiggleZenMaster @johncampea If I put the fan part of me aside, I still believe that. I think the storytelling for Finn and Rose wasn't the best and that Rey and Finn have a foundation if they're is going to be a ship in this saga. 
But I love TFA and JJ. I think he will make a great and satisfying movie

@MrAndrewKoolaid @johncampea Most people wanted Luke to ignite a green lightsaber and wreck fools. Most people wanted their snoke theories to be true. I’ve learned that whatever I “want” as a fan doesn’t matter.
@MrAndrewKoolaid @johncampea Yeah, but like they totally killed off snoke, made Rey’s parents not matter, and made like sad. I have no faith anything will tie up nicely. But here’s to hoping.

@GiggleZenMaster @johncampea Kylo is a abusive, manipulate sociopath and Disney is not going to put a beloved female character into a abusive relationship... unless Rey somehow pulls Kylo back to the light but I think that ship has sailed.

@GiggleZenMaster @johncampea Not sure about that. Rian had Rey look jealously at Finn and Rose. If JJ doesn't prefer the Finn Rose angle, he can use that to ship Finn and Rey which is what I believe most people want and feels organic after what they've been through.
@johncampea Yeah but Finn is definitely in the friend zone now thanks to Kyle Ren.
